title: Hello World
content:
Welcome to [Hexo](https://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](https://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).

## Quick Start

### Create a new post

``` bash
$ hexo new "My New Post"
```

More info: [Writing](https://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

### Run server

``` bash
$ hexo server
```

More info: [Server](https://hexo.io/docs/server.html)

### Generate static files

``` bash
$ hexo generate
```

More info: [Generating](https://hexo.io/docs/generating.html)

### Deploy to remote sites

``` bash
$ hexo deploy
```

More info: [Deployment](https://hexo.io/docs/one-command-deployment.html)

title: text
content:
# 标题一 
## 标题二 ##
### 标题三 ###
#### 标题四 ####
##### 标题五 #####
###### 标题六 ######
> 引用 右尖括号

有序列表:
1. 一后面接点
2. 回车

无序列表:
- 使用短横线
* 或使用星号

任务列表:
- [ ] 横杠
- [ ] 左方括号
- [ ] 空格
- [ ] 右方括号
- [x] 括号输入x勾选
* [ ] 也可以用星号

代码块:
```c
int main(){
    printf("三个反引号再接语言,后再用三个反引号包起来")
    return 0;
}
```
数学公式:
$$
\frac{\partial f}{\partial x} = 2\sqrt{a}x(开头结尾各两个美元符号) 
$$

表格：
|表头|表头|表头|
|:---|---:|:---:|
|用棍符号分开|冒号加短横线确定对齐方式|/|
|冒号在左表示左对齐|在右表示右对齐|两边都有表示居中|

脚注:
脚注怎么使用？[^脚注]
[^脚注]:方括号内加尖号

可以用三个横线

---

把文章分成若干部分

---

文字靠近横线自动加粗不知是为何

链接:
[方括号里填名称，圆括号里放链接，双引号里可以添加标题](. "这是一个空的链接")

引用链接:
[链接，圆括号里填一个字母，另一个地方格式照旧][id]
[id]:x "就像这样"


跳转标题:
参考[这是标题一](#标题一 "sys")

URL:
https://www.bilibili.com

图片:
![感叹号加方括号加圆括号](https://tiebapic.baidu.com/forum/pic/item/f0f7c582b2b7d0a2e0f877858def76094b369a3d.jpg?tbpicau=2025-12-27-05_3911fc80b622959cdc523f554cb64001)

*一对星号包起来是斜体*
**两个表加粗**
`一对反引号编写行内代码`
$\frac{一对美元}{表行内数学公式}$
<u>一对尖括号包u是下划线</u>
冒号包表情代码是表情:smile:
~下标~用波浪号包起来H~2~O
^上标^用尖冒号括起来a^2^+b^2^=c^2^
==文字高亮==用两对等号

title: Hello World
content:
Welcome to [Hexo](https://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](https://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).

## Quick Start

### Create a new post

``` bash
$ hexo new "My New Post"
```

More info: [Writing](https://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

### Run server

``` bash
$ hexo server
```

More info: [Server](https://hexo.io/docs/server.html)

### Generate static files

``` bash
$ hexo generate
```

More info: [Generating](https://hexo.io/docs/generating.html)

### Deploy to remote sites

``` bash
$ hexo deploy
```

More info: [Deployment](https://hexo.io/docs/one-command-deployment.html)
